details.description:
Dominic Cheetham is the founder ofRed Kite Reputation Management.Over the last 18 years, he hasbuilt up extensive experience defining and managing the reputations of organisations across diverse sectors including energy, transport, healthcare, science, public services, BPO and data. Previously Dominic was the Corporate Communications Director at global government services business Serco Group plc, where for eight years he led its reputation building programme as it trebled both its revenues and number of employees.Prior to 2004 he was the British Gas’s Director of Communications during the time when the UK’s monopoly energy supply markets were being de-regulated.

Dominic began his career as a news and current affairs journalist working in newspapers, radio and television. He covered major events including the Lockerbie bombing and both the Hillsborough and Kegworth disasters, and reported on the demise of the UK’s coal and steel industries before deciding that the best way to influence organisations was from the inside.
